channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large scale pruning has taken place on the public footpath in Prestbury from St Mary's School to the Noverton estate outside 6 Honeysuckle Close off Whitethorn Drive. It is claimed by the contractor that this has been taken place in the garden of No 6 but it is quite clear that the trees are outside the garden and by the edge of the public footpath. Would the house owner or the contractor have had to get a permit this work and is it possible to check if this work was legal?, 30th June
item.description:
Large scale pruning has taken place on the public footpath in Prestbury from St Mary's School to the Noverton estate outside 6 Honeysuckle Close off Whitethorn Drive. It is claimed by the contractor that this has been taken place in the garden of No 6 but it is quite clear that the trees are outside the garden and by the edge of the public footpath. Would the house owner or the contractor have had to get a permit this work and is it possible to check if this work was legal?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Honeysuckle Close, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposting, 30th June
item.description:
Under the prom flyposting yet again. This business is prolific for attaching signs to road signs, lights and railings across the area from Cheltenham to Gloucester and Tewkesbury

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester

item.title: Pot hole on left hand side of the road heading towards Kingsditch, 30th June
item.description:
Pot hole is just as the bridge starts, due to the reduced road width where the pothole is, motorists either have to hit the pothole or swerve into oncoming traffic to avoid it, I have seen many near misses and based on the broken wing-mirrors that litter the bridge, many drivers have not been so lucky trying to avoid this pot-hole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two grass verges on Trafalgar Drive near Tallis Road., 30th June
item.description:
Both grass verges on Trafalgar Drive on both sides at the junction to Tallis Road have unfortunately been missed on the last grass verge cut. The verges are now really long and are obstructing a clear view of the junction prohibiting safe entry/exit. Please could you arrange for both of these two very long grass verges, which were missed, to be cut as soon as is possible. Thank you very much.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trafalgar Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weed killing needed Brunel Drive and Castle Close Gotherington, 30th June
item.description:
Brunel Drive and Castle Close Gotherington. The footpaths and kerb edges need weed killing due to a gradual build up of weeds on the flags and kerb edges. It is two years since these streets were adopted and they have received no attention yet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cinder Close, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
